body:
So there was a community party on TeamSpeak and in Minecraft itself and 1 person could win a Emerald rank, and I won it!! I want to thank Jake for giving me this chance and making this day unforgettable.

Jake and the TeamSpeak crew <3

-Budah

title: Community Party. [Emerald Rank]

replies.body: Congrats man, heard it was fun

replies.body: Congratulations on the rank! Unfortunately I missed the party, hope you had fun!
